TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRedirectHandler implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: A handler for determining if an HTTP request should be redirected to a new location in response to an HTTP response received from the target server.

remarks.para: A handler for determining if an HTTP request should be redirected to a new location in response to an HTTP response received from the target server.
Classes implementing this interface must synchronize access to shared data as methods of this interfrace may be executed from multiple threads

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Net.URI GetLocationURI (Org.Apache.Http.IHttpResponse response, Org.Apache.Http.Protocol.IHttpContext context);

Docs.param: the response received from the target server
the context for the request execution
Docs.summary: Determines the location request is expected to be redirected to given the response from the target server and the current request execution context.

remarks.para: Determines the location request is expected to be redirected to given the response from the target server and the current request execution context.
